Parameters: String: Subject heading for this share
setSubject(java.lang.String).Description: Set a subject heading for this share; useful for sharing via email.

addEmailBcc(java.lang.String).Description: Add an email address to be used in the "bcc" field of the final Intent.

Returns: A chooser Intent for the currently configured sharing action
createChooserIntent().Description: Create an Intent that will launch the standard Android activity chooser, allowing the user to pick what activity/app on the system should handle the share.

startChooser().Description: Start a chooser activity for the current share intent. Note that under most circumstances you should use @B_android#support#v4#app#ShareCompat#configureMenuItem_E@ to add a Share item to the menu while presenting a detail view of the content to be shared instead of invoking this directly.

addEmailBcc(java.lang.String[]).Description: Add an array of email addresses to be used in the "bcc" field of the final Intent.

Parameters: String: mimetype of the shared data
setType(java.lang.String).Description: Set the type of data being shared

Parameters: Uri: URI of the stream to share
setStream(android.net.Uri).Description: Set a stream URI to the data that should be shared. This replaces all currently set stream URIs and will produce a single-stream ACTION_SEND intent.

Parameters: int: Resource ID of the title string to use
setChooserTitle(int).Description: Set the title that will be used for the activity chooser for this share.

Parameters: Uri: URI of the stream to share
addStream(android.net.Uri).Description: Add a stream URI to the data that should be shared. If this is not the first stream URI added the final intent constructed will become an ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE intent. Not all apps will handle both ACTION_SEND and ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE.

Parameters: String: Email addresses to send to
setEmailTo(java.lang.String[]).Description: Set an array of email addresses as recipients of this share. This replaces all current "to" recipients that have been set so far.

Parameters: String: Email address to send to
addEmailTo(java.lang.String).Description: Add an email address to be used in the "to" field of the final Intent.

Parameters: Activity: Activity that the share will be launched from
from(android.app.Activity).Description: Create a new IntentBuilder for launching a sharing action from launchingActivity.

Parameters: String: Email addresses to send to
addEmailTo(java.lang.String[]).Description: Add an array of email addresses to be used in the "to" field of the final Intent.

addEmailCc(java.lang.String).Description: Add an email address to be used in the "cc" field of the final Intent.

addEmailCc(java.lang.String[]).Description: Add an array of email addresses to be used in the "cc" field of the final Intent.

Parameters: String: Email addresses to BCC on the share
setEmailBcc(java.lang.String[]).Description: Set an array of email addresses to BCC on this share. This replaces all current "BCC" recipients that have been set so far.

Parameters: String: A string containing HTML markup as a richer version of the text provided by EXTRA_TEXT.
setHtmlText(java.lang.String).Description: Set an HTML string to be sent as part of the share. If @B_android#content#Intent#EXTRA_TEXT_E@ has not already been supplied, a styled version of the supplied HTML text will be added as EXTRA_TEXT as parsed by @B_android#text#Html#fromHtml_E@.

setText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the literal text data to be sent as part of the share. This may be a styled CharSequence.

setChooserTitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the title that will be used for the activity chooser for this share.

Parameters: String: Email addresses to CC on the share
setEmailCc(java.lang.String[]).Description: Set an array of email addresses to CC on this share. This replaces all current "CC" recipients that have been set so far.

Returns: The current Intent being configured by this builder
getIntent().Description: Retrieve the Intent as configured so far by the IntentBuilder. This Intent is suitable for use in a ShareActionProvider or chooser dialog. To create an intent that will launch the activity chooser so that the user may select a target for the share, see @B_android#support#v4#app#ShareCompat#IntentBuilder#createChooserIntent_E@.

ClassDesc: IntentBuilder is a helper for constructing https:##developer#android#com@B_android#content#Intent#ACTION_SEND_E@ and https:##developer#android#com@B_android#content#Intent#ACTION_SEND_MULTIPLE_E@ sharing intents and starting activities to share content. The ComponentName and package name of the calling activity will be included.
